title: Spear of the Botono
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|A dark and malign artefact. It increases the potency of hexes cast by anyone unwise enough to risk wielding it.}} [[File:Spear_of_the_botono.png]] '''''the +6 spear of the Botono'''''
+6 [[spear]] [[Reaping]] brand
rPois
rN+
-6 [[HP]]
Enhances [[Hexes]] ==Desirability== The '''spear of the Botono''' is a good weapon for the early- and mid-game, but sadly a spear will be outclassed later on, even one as good as this. That being said, using it as an unorthodox [[magical staff]] for your Hexes is not a bad idea, and the reaping brand is nice for generating an army of [[zombie]] meat shields (though [[Animate Dead]] works fine for that purpose regardless of your weapon). Just don't expect to do ''that'' much damage if you use this for [[stabbing]]; [[polearms]] don't get a very big bonus for that purpose. ==History== The Spear of Botono was removed in [[0.16]]. Prior to [[0.15]], this weapon had a +2,+10 enchantment level. Prior to [[0.12]], it did not enhance Hexes, made [[noise]] while equipped, and only reduced your HP by 3.
